content: Line 1 shows net interest income on a fully tax equivalent basis of $146.6 million, when you back out non-core interest income items such as fair value accretion on line 2 and the impact of PPP loans shown on line 3, our core net interest income totaled $143.1 million, which is shown on line 4 compared to the prior quarter total of $130.7 million, the increase in core net interest income was $12.4 million, reflecting our higher loan yields.
